newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Zaire's Mobutu left Switzerland-Swiss news agency.
newsitem.headline: Zaire's Mobutu left Switzerland-Swiss news agency.

text.p: Zaire's ailing president Mobutu Sese Seko left Switzerland on Monday on board a private plane for an unknown destination, the Swiss news agency said.
The Swiss agency ATS said officials at Geneva's airport announced Mobutu's departure on Monday afternoon but gave no details.
The 66-year-old Zairean president was in Switzerland since August when he underwent surgery for prostate cancer at the University Hospital in Lausanne.
He had been living with his entourage of more than 20 bodyguards and aides at the city's luxury Beau-Rivage Palace hotel.
